name: Iron Cobra
damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren\'t adamantine
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

traits.Magic Resistance: The iron cobra has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13+1d4 + 11 Constitution saving throw or suffer one random poison effect:
